channel.title: Java Based Game with exquisite detail
channel.description: Is it possible, without an uneccisary amount of file shrinkage to create a game in java that is client based, like that of runescape, but a totally independent entity? I mean using the same game engine client altaring of course full screen mode constantly enabled and to have it in a way that wouldn't limit those who don't have a great graphics card to run it? I don't know if this is the right place to be posting this, but I'd like to know if what I am aiming for is possible, before I dedicate any time to it.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:554403”]If you need help with this, you probably should not make a MMORPG.

For Java game engines, go here: https://www.google.no/search?q=Java+game+engine[/quote]

item.title: Java Based Game with exquisite detail
item.dc:creator: @suseto21 suseto21
item.description:
@suseto21 wrote:

How would I go about setting up a suitable engine then? Or atleast determining the engine required to operate without latency? Also, would it be possible to introduce a game, java based with a sql linked to an offline mode game? In other words, a f2p mode for offline use, and a p2p mode for online multiplayer use?

Read full topic
item.source: Java Based Game with exquisite detail

item.title: Java Based Game with exquisite detail
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I’ve no idea what you want. But no, you most likely would NOT want to use the RS engine to make your own game. Use a proper Java game engine.

Read full topic
